Gem_C_Charcoal.name: Essence of Charcoal
Gem_C_Charcoal.description: When this memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, it fires a charcoal fragment, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>30%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>. If the target is already <color=yellow>burning</color>, it deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>50%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>fire damage</color> instead.

Gem_C_Confidence.name: Essence of Confidence
Gem_C_Confidence.description: Damage dealt by this memory to nearby enemies is increased by 20%<sprite=5>.

Gem_C_Efficiency.name: Essence of Efficiency
Gem_C_Efficiency.description: This Memory gains 18<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color>, reducing its <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> by 15%<sprite=5>.

Gem_C_Guidance.name: Essence of Guidance
Gem_C_Guidance.description: This Memory's <color=yellow>Healing Amount</color> is increased by 20%<sprite=5>. 30% of the excess healing from this Memory is converted into a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for 2 seconds.

Gem_C_Lethality.name: Essence of Lethality
Gem_C_Lethality.description: This memory's damage against enemies with 70% or more health is increased by 30%<sprite=5>.

Gem_C_Quicksilver.name: Essence of Quicksilver
Gem_C_Quicksilver.description: When <color=yellow>casting</color> this memory or dealing <color=yellow>fire damage</color> with it, <color=yellow>movement speed</color> increases by 20%<sprite=5> and returns to normal over 2.5 seconds.

Gem_C_Regeneration.name: Essence of Regeneration
Gem_C_Regeneration.description: If this memory is <color=yellow>Cast</color> <color=yellow>in Combat</color>, it <color=yellow>Restores</color> your health by 28<sprite=5> over 7 seconds.

Gem_C_Sharp.name: Essence of Sharpness
Gem_C_Sharp.description: <color=yellow>Casting</color> this memory fires 5 arrows that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>45%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to random enemies.

Gem_C_Shatter.name: Essence of Shatter
Gem_C_Shatter.description: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>Cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>. Damage dealt to enemies by <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color> is increased by 20%<sprite=5>. If it deals <color=yellow>Light Damage</color>, it is increased by 30%<sprite=5> instead.

Gem_C_Talc.name: Essence of Talc
Gem_C_Talc.description: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>Cast</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>. The initial damage dealt to each enemy by <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color> is increased by <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5>.

Gem_C_Void.name: Essence of the Void
Gem_C_Void.description: After casting this memory, your next <color=yellow>attack</color> within 4 seconds will explode, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>125%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>dark damage</color> to the target and nearby enemies.

Gem_C_Wind.name: Essence of Wind
Gem_C_Wind.description: Casting this memory increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by 22%<sprite=5> for 5 seconds.

Gem_E_Clemency.name: Essence of Clemency
Gem_E_Clemency.description: Heal <color=yellow>self</color> for 5%<sprite=5> of the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this Memory.

Gem_E_Direness.name: Essence of Direness
Gem_E_Direness.description: The lower my <color=yellow>Health</color>, the shorter the <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> of this Memory. When my <color=yellow>Health</color> is at 30%, the <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> is reduced by up to 35%<sprite=5>.

Gem_E_Insight.name: Essence of Insight
Gem_E_Insight.description: When this Memory deals any <color=yellow>damage</color> to an enemy, it deals an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to up to 3<sprite=5> enemies and increases <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> by 10<sprite=5> for 5 seconds. Can only trigger once every 3 seconds.

Gem_E_Metal.name: Essence of Metal
Gem_E_Metal.description: When you <color=yellow>Slay</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by 0.5<sprite=5> seconds.

Gem_E_Pain.name: Essence of Pain
Gem_E_Pain.description: All <color=yellow>Damage</color> dealt by this Memory deals 20%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Area Damage</color> around the target. This <color=yellow>Area Damage</color> shares the elemental type with the original damage.

Gem_E_Predation.name: Essence of Predation
Gem_E_Predation.description: Increases <color=yellow>Damage</color> dealt by this Memory to <color=yellow>Bosses</color> and <color=yellow>Hunters</color> by 30%<sprite=5>. Defeating a <color=yellow>Hunter</color> drops 1 <color=yellow>Orbs of Strength</color>, and defeating a <color=yellow>Boss</color> drops 3. Acquiring an <color=yellow>Orb of Strength</color> permanently increases either <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> or <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> by 1 at random.

Gem_E_Thunder.name: Essence of Thunder
Gem_E_Thunder.description: When you <color=yellow>Cast</color> <color=yellow>another Memory</color> or use <color=yellow>Dodge</color>, gain 1 stack of <color=yellow>Thunder</color>, up to 5<sprite=5> times. When you <color=yellow>Cast</color> this Memory, consume all stacks of <color=yellow>Thunder</color> to call down lightning on nearby enemies, once for each stack. Each lightning deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>65%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color>.

Gem_E_Twilight.name: Essence of Twilight
Gem_E_Twilight.description: Convert my <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> damage to <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color>. When this Memory deals damage to an enemy with 3 or more stacks of <color=yellow>Dark</color>, consume all stacks to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>27%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> per stack and heal for 4<sprite=5> per stack.

Gem_E_Virtuousness.name: Essence of Virtue
Gem_E_Virtuousness.description: The number of charges for this Memory increases by 1<sprite=5>. Each 150% increase in quality raises the number of charges by 1.

Gem_L_Embertail.name: Embertail
Gem_L_Embertail.description: My <color=yellow>Attacks</color> ricochet to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>50%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> to a nearby enemy. For each nearby enemy engulfed in flames, this memory's <color=yellow>Damage</color> and <color=yellow>Healing</color> are increased by 4%<sprite=5> and its <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> is reduced 4%<sprite=5> faster. My fire damage over time is increased by 100%.

Gem_L_GlacialCore.name: Glacial Core
Gem_L_GlacialCore.description: Every 5 seconds, if you deal <color=yellow>damage</color> with this memory, you <color=yellow>recover</color> <color=yellow>health</color> equal to 3%<sprite=5> of your maximum health. If it is <color=yellow>cold damage</color>, the effect is increased by 100%. 250%<sprite=5> of all <color=yellow>health recovery</color> you receive is converted into <color=yellow>cold damage</color> and fires <color=yellow>ice shards</color> at enemies.

Gem_L_Paranoia.name: Essence of Paranoia
Gem_L_Paranoia.description: When you take any <color=yellow>damage</color>, this Memory gains 75<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Memory Haste</color> for 6 seconds, reducing its <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> by 43%<sprite=5>, but it is <color=yellow>Automatically Cast</color> on nearby enemies.

Gem_L_Perfect.name: Perfection
Gem_L_Perfect.description: Increases Attack Damage by 4<sprite=5>, Ability Power by 4<sprite=5>, maximum Health by 18<sprite=5>, Attack Speed by 5%<sprite=5>, Critical Strike Chance by 3%<sprite=5>, and Memory Haste by 5<sprite=5>.

Gem_R_Blade.name: Essence of Blade
Gem_R_Blade.description: Each time this memory <color=yellow>hits</color> an enemy, it summons blades that lacerate the target for <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>55%</color><sprite=5> damage 2<sprite=5> times. Can only trigger once every 2 seconds for each enemy.

Gem_R_Celestial.name: Essence of the Celestial
Gem_R_Celestial.description: Every 10 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>. When an <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color> hits an enemy for the first time, it drops 4 meteors that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>65%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> each.

Gem_R_Dusk.name: Essence of Dusk
Gem_R_Dusk.description: Upon casting this Memory, fire 2 <color=yellow>Dusk Shards</color> that deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>25%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> each time you <color=yellow>Attack</color> an enemy for 5 seconds.

Gem_R_Flow.name: Essence of Flow
Gem_R_Flow.description: When dealing <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> with any memory, reduces this memory's <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> by 4%<sprite=5>. For ultimate abilities, only 40% of the effect is applied. <color=yellow>Cooldown Reduction</color> effects this memory receives also apply to equipped <color=yellow>Essences</color>.

Gem_R_Frost.name: Essence of Frost
Gem_R_Frost.description:
When this memory deals <color=yellow>cold damage</color>, it deals additional <color=yellow>cold damage</color> equal to 7%<sprite=5> of my <color=yellow>maximum health</color> and briefly <color=yellow>stuns</color> the target. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds for each enemy. Each time it triggers, my <color=yellow>maximum health</color> permanently increases by 1.
(Currently gained health: 0)

Gem_R_Glaciate.name: Essence of Glaciation
Gem_R_Glaciate.description: When this Memory is <color=yellow>cast</color>, releases a burst of cold, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>80%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> to enemies. The area of effect increases with quality.

Gem_R_Insatiable.name: Essence of Voracity
Gem_R_Insatiable.description: For 5 seconds after casting this memory, <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> is increased by 10%<sprite=5> and <color=yellow>heal</color> 4<sprite=5> health on each <color=yellow>Attack</color>.

Gem_R_Momentum.name: Essence of Momentum
Gem_R_Momentum.description: Each time you <color=yellow>Attack</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> of this Memory is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by 0.2<sprite=5> seconds.

Gem_R_NightSky.name: Essence of Night Sky
Gem_R_NightSky.description: Each time this Memory <color=yellow>Hits</color> an enemy, your <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> increases by 5%<sprite=5> for 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 10%<sprite=5>. If it deals <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color>, it can increase up to a maximum of 20%<sprite=5>. Attacking an enemy refreshes the duration of this effect.

Gem_R_Scorched.name: Essence of Scorch
Gem_R_Scorched.description: When this memory is <color=yellow>cast</color>, it drops 2<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fireballs</color> that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>35%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> to nearby enemies.

Gem_R_Spiral.name: Essence of Spiral
Gem_R_Spiral.description: Periodically fires a fireball at a random nearby enemy, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color>. Higher quality increases the firing speed.

Gem_R_Wealth.name: Essence of Wealth
Gem_R_Wealth.description: When an enemy damaged by this memory is killed within 6 seconds, they drop 2<sprite=5> gold. Gold is shared among all Travelers.

Gem_L_DivineFaith.name: Divine Faith
Gem_L_DivineFaith.description:
Each time you <color=yellow>Slay</color> an enemy with this Memory, gain a stack of <color=yellow>Faith</color>, up to 30<sprite=5> stacks. For each stack of <color=yellow>Faith</color>, this Memory's <color=yellow>Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>Healing</color> to allies is increased by 0.5%, and your maximum Health is increased by 4.
(Health increased by 0/120<sprite=5>, Damage and Healing increased by 0/15%<sprite=5>)

Gem_E_Flexibility.name: Essence of Flexibility
Gem_E_Flexibility.description: While this memory is on <color=yellow>Cooldown</color>, if you take any <color=yellow>Damage</color>, you take 9%<sprite=5> of the damage received <color=yellow>split</color> over 4 seconds. The damage you take from this <color=yellow>split</color> is reduced by 20%.

Gem_C_Vengeance.name: Essence of Vengeance
Gem_C_Vengeance.description: When you take any damage, fire 2 blades that deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to nearby enemies. After taking damage, this memory's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by 20%<sprite=5> for 5 seconds.

Gem_E_Omega.name: Essence of Finality
Gem_E_Omega.description: While this Memory is not on <color=yellow>Cooldown</color>, gain a stack of <color=yellow>Finality</color> every second, up to 20 stacks. While having stacks, <color=yellow>Casting</color> this Memory is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>, increasing its <color=yellow>Damage</color> by 3%<sprite=5> per stack. (Currently 0/55%<sprite=5> increased)

Gem_R_Rigidity.name: Essence of Rigidity
Gem_R_Rigidity.description: When this Memory <color=yellow>Hits</color> an enemy, gain a 5<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for 2 seconds. If it deals <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color>, this effect is increased by 80%.

Gem_E_Might.name: Essence of the Giant
Gem_E_Might.description:
Increases maximum health by 130<sprite=5>. Damage dealt by this memory to enemies is increased by 1% per 50 of my <color=yellow>maximum health</color>.
(Currently increased by 0)

Gem_L_SolarEye.name: Eye of the Sun
Gem_L_SolarEye.description:
Every 20 seconds, this Memory's <color=yellow>Cast</color> is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>, raining <color=yellow>Solar Light</color> upon all nearby enemies who are <color=yellow>Burning</color>. <color=yellow>Solar Light</color> deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> over 1.5 seconds and increases <color=yellow>Burn</color> stacks by 6<sprite=5>.
Increases my Fire damage over time by 100%.

Gem_C_Sulfur.name: Essence of Sulfur
Gem_C_Sulfur.description: All <color=yellow>Damage</color> dealt by this memory is increased by 8%<sprite=5> and converted to <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color>. My fire damage over time is increased by 25%<sprite=5>.

Gem_E_Overload.name: Essence of Overload
Gem_E_Overload.description: When you <color=yellow>Cast</color> this memory, <color=yellow>Sacrifice</color> 20% of your current Health to <color=yellow>Empower</color> the <color=yellow>Cast</color>. The <color=yellow>Damage</color> and <color=yellow>Healing</color> dealt by the <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color> are increased by 23%<sprite=5>.

Gem_R_Contempt.name: Essence of Contempt
Gem_R_Contempt.description: The <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt by this memory increases as the target's health gets lower, up to 30%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>increase</color> when their health is 20%.

Gem_R_Bleak.name: Essence of Bleakness
Gem_R_Bleak.description: This Memory deals 25%<sprite=5> increased damage to enemies affected by <color=yellow>Cold</color>, <color=yellow>Slow</color>, <color=yellow>Bind</color>, or <color=yellow>Stun</color>.

Gem_L_PureWhite.name: Pure White
Gem_L_PureWhite.description: Every 10 seconds, the <color=yellow>Cast</color> of this memory is <color=yellow>Empowered</color>. The <color=yellow>Empowered Cast</color> fires 3 <color=yellow>Projectiles</color> that deal <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> equal to 10%<sprite=5> of the <color=yellow>Damage</color> it first deals to each enemy. The number of shots increases by the number of <color=yellow>Light Stacks</color> on each target.

Gem_R_Wound.name: Essence of Wound
Gem_R_Wound.description: When this Memory deals damage to an enemy, it engraves a <color=yellow>Mark</color>. Each <color=yellow>Attack</color> on the <color=yellow>Mark</color> deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>25%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color>, and attacking 3 times causes the <color=yellow>Mark</color> to burst, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>110%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color>.

Gem_E_Protection.name: Essence of Protection
Gem_E_Protection.description: When you <color=yellow>cast</color> this memory, gain 20<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Defense</color> for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken and becoming <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color>. Can only trigger once every 5 seconds.
